name: init <path>
description: Initialize a new Grouparoo project.  Use "." for this directory.

force.description: overwrite the generated files if they already exist

name: update
description: Upgrade the NPM packages in this Grouparoo project

name: install [package]
description: Install a grouparoo plugin (via npm install) and enable it.  Use package@version for a specific version or tag

timestamps.description: Should timestamps be prepended to each log line?

name: console
description: Start an interactive REPL session with the api object in-scope

timestamps.description: Should timestamps be prepended to each log line?

name: destroy
description: Remove imported Profiles, Groups, Imports, and Exports from your cluster.  Properties, Groups and other configuration will remain.

timestamps.description: Should timestamps be prepended to each log line?

name: generate [template] [id]
description: Generate new code config files from templates.

list.description: Display the available config templates to use with config-generate.  You can filter the list of templates by providing a string to match against, ie: `grouparoo generate app --list` to see templates which match "app"

describe.description: Display the options for the template in detail

path.description: The location of the config directory

name: run
description: Run all Schedules, Runs, Imports and Exports pending in this cluster.  Use GROUPAROO_LOG_LEVEL env to set log level.

destroy.description: [DANGER] Empty the cluster of all Profile data before starting the run?

reset-high-watermarks.description: Should we run all Schedules from the beginning?

run-all-schedules.description: Should we run all Schedules, even those that do not have a recurring time set?

web.description: Enable the web server during this run?

timestamps.description: Should timestamps be prepended to each log line?

name: start
description: Run the Grouparoo server.  Use GROUPAROO_LOG_LEVEL env to set log level.

timestamps.description: Should timestamps be prepended to each log line?

name: status
description: Display the status of your Grouparoo cluster

timestamps.description: Should timestamps be prepended to each log line?

name: sync <profileProperty>
description: Sync (import & export) a Profile.  You can provide a Profile id or a unique Profile Property

property.description: Choose the name of the Property to find the Profile by (i.e.: email_address)

timestamps.description: Should timestamps be prepended to each log line?

json.description: Return data as JSON? Use process.env.GROUPAROO_LOG_LEVEL=alert to disable other messages.

timestamps.description: Should timestamps be prepended to each log line?
